Package it.unipv.posfw.orbit.exception

package it.unipv.posfw.orbit.exception
  • Exception Classes
    Class
    Description
    AmountNotValidException
    exception thrown when a discount value is outside of the limits
    CodeNotFoundException
    exception thrown when a user try to use gift card code that is not in the db.
    GameNotFoundException
    exception thrown when an operation targets a game that cannot be found in the database or in the user's library.
    PaymentFailedException
    exception thrown when a game purchase transaction fails due to errors or insufficient funds.
    ReviewNotFoundException
    exception thrown when a user's review for a specific game cannot be found in the database.
    UserAlreadyExistException
    exception thrown during the signup process when a user attempts to register with a nickname that is already taken.
    UserNotFoundException
    exception thrown when a user attempt to login with an unregistered nickname.
    WrongPasswordException
    exception thrown when a user attempts to log in with an incorrect password.
